Gjeldende nivå: {year":2025,"level":"0","level_display":"0","vedtak":"Publiseringskanalen ble ikke godkjent for nivå 1 pga. mangelfull beskrivelse av publiseringskanalens rutiner for fagfellevurdering på vurderingstidspunktet (2017). Rutiner for fagfellevurdering må være tydelig beskrevet. (Det er ikke tilstrekkelig at det står at bidragene blir fagfellevurdert, prosessen må være beskrevet.) For revurdering av publiseringskanalen, må nytt forslag sendes inn via forslagsskjemaet for nivå 1, når den manglende informasjonen er tilgjengelig.","decision":"The publication channel was not approved for level 1 due to an inadequate description of its peer review procedures at the time of evaluation (2017). The procedure for peer review must be clearly outlined. (It is not sufficient merely to state that the contributions undergo peer review
Nedlagt: the process itself must be described.) To request reconsideration, please suggest the publication channel via the submission form for level 1 once the missing information is available."}"

Gjeldende nivå: {year":2025,"level":"0","level_display":"0","vedtak":"Ikke godkjent da fagfellevurderingen ikke utføres av minst en ekstern fagfelle: "First, the article goes to one of the members of the Senior Editorial Team. Here, the draft article undergoes rigorous quality control and review of content, analytical rigour, and language. Next it is sent for a second review by the other Senior Editorial Team member or a subject expert working at (or with) the European Observatory on Health System and Policies."","decision":"Not approved because the peer review is not done by at least one external peer: First, the article goes to one of the members of the Senior Editorial Team. Here, the draft article undergoes rigorous quality control and review of content, analytical rigour, and language. Next it is sent for a second review by the other Senior Editorial Team member or a subject expert working at (or with) the European Observatory on Health System and Policies.""}"
